intro: Erechtites goyazensis, commonly known as the Goiás eryngo, is a flowering plant native to Brazil. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically grows in open habitats such as grasslands and disturbed soils. It features narrow, lance-shaped leaves and produces yellow flowers that bloom in the summer. Erechtites goyazensis is notable for its ecological role in supporting local pollinators.
